definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: The bright surfaces of clouds and snow are revealed by moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 月光照映出明亮的白云和积雪。

sentences.english: Bright dark cherry red colour with brick- red hints.
sentences.chinese: 略带砖红色的明亮深樱桃红。

sentences.english: Dual-layer liquid formula has shinning watery texture.
sentences.chinese: 双层液体配方，明亮水珠质地。

sentences.english: He was rather elderly with clear blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他上了年纪，有双明亮的蓝眼睛。

sentences.english: Constructing a brightly colored nest works wonders for the bowerbird.
sentences.chinese: 造一个色彩明亮的巢会在园丁鸟中产生奇妙的作用。

sentences.english: A weasel has soft under-fur protected by stiff, shiny guard hairs.
sentences.chinese: 鼬的柔软的下层绒毛，由坚硬明亮的针毛保护着。

sentences.english: The fullmoon normally glows from reflected sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 满月通常会因为反射太阳光而明亮。

sentences.english: Our sky chart shows the bright waxing gibbous moon and the planet Jupiter for around mid-evening tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今日的星图展示了午夜前后明亮的凸月和木星。

sentences.english: From West Lake in Hangzhou, this tea has a bright color and a pleasant fresh taste.
sentences.chinese: 源自杭州西湖，茶汤明亮清澈，清新爽口。

sentences.english: Du Du's bright mahogany eyes fade when he mentions them.
sentences.chinese: 当他提到他们时，杜杜那双明亮热情的双眼暗了下去。

sentences.english: The stars shone brighter than ever before, and an owl hooted in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 星星照耀得比以往更加明亮，猫头鹰在远处咕咕叫着。

sentences.english: ' Rose's face brightens a little when she remembers that moment.
sentences.chinese: 回忆起那个时期，罗斯的脸变得明亮动人起来。

sentences.english: It occurs to me that the greatest gentleness would put a bullet into his bright eye.
sentences.chinese: 我想那最伟大的温和将会把一颗子弹射入他明亮的眼。

sentences.english: It had three large bright lights lighting up the sky underneath it.
sentences.chinese: 它下面有三束很大的明亮光线照亮着天空。

sentences.english: Not much escapes our teacher's beady eye.
sentences.chinese: 任何事都很难逃过我们老师那明亮的眼睛。

sentences.english: I like the falt. It's large, light and modern.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这套公寓，它空间很大，明亮而且很现代化。

definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
bright and beautiful/(of a landscape) gorgeous/(of a color) vibrant
